item.description:
Dr. David Schafer, former president of HUUmanists, will give an expanded version of his part of the presentation he gave with current president John Hooper at this year's General Assembly of the Unitarian Universalist Association. (John Hooper will reprise his part of the talk at our November meeting, not the October meeting as originally announced.)

We'll start with a half hour of coffee and conversation at 7:30 p.m. and the main talk will follow brief announcements at 8:00 PM.
item.how_to_find_us: We will most probably be in the Social Hall near the main entrance.
item.name: Monthly Meeting: The Legacy of Unitarian Universalist Humanism
